newsitem.title: UK: Joan Ruddock joins UK government as junior minister.
newsitem.headline: Joan Ruddock joins UK government as junior minister.

text.p: Prime Minister Tony Blair on Wednesday named Joan Ruddock as a junior minister in the Department of Social Security.
Ruddock, MP for Lewisham Deptford, will support Social Security Secretary Harriet Harman in her role as minister for women.
Ruddock, who was Harman's parliamentary private secretary, will not draw ministerial pay because the legal limit on the number of ministerial salaries has already been reached.
